DataElement.preferredName: Pain Medication Right Maxilla Tooth Use Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator whether a drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings associated with a tooth, hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates, located in the upper right quadrant, the right side of the upper jaw, of the mouth was used.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pain Medication Right Maxilla Tooth Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the use of a drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings associated with a tooth, hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates, located in the upper right quadrant, the right side of the upper jaw, of the mouth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unpleasant sensation induced by noxious stimuli and generally received by specialized nerve endings.:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: Right; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.:The upper jawbone in vertebrates: it is fused to the cranium.:is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The upper jawbone in vertebrates; it is fused to the cranium.
The hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates; primarily used for eating.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did you take the pain medicat
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did you take the pain medication for pain and/or sensitivity in the tooth in the study that was filled in the upper right tooth quadrant
